author: PA News Agency
title: Dublin is safe compared to other western cities, Varadkar insists | News and Star
text: Dublin is a safe city when compared with others in the western world, the Taoiseach has insisted. Leo Varadkar said while it is important to acknowledge and listen to the experiences of those who have fallen victim to crime in Dublin, he insisted such incidents are not the norm for Ireland’s capital. There has been an increased focus on safety in Dublin following a series of well publicised random attacks and assaults on people in the city. That scrutiny intensified after the events of November 23, when rioting broke out in the city centre following a knife attack on three young children and their care assistant outside a primary school. Opposition parties claim a reduction in Garda numbers has contributed to a situation where parts of the city are no longer safe. It is a charge the Government has rejected. Mr Varadkar was asked about the issue of safety in Dublin at his end of year media briefing with political journalists. “There’s no city that’s 100% safe,” he said. “If you look at something like the murder rate, for example, in Ireland or Dublin, compare that to other countries or other major cities, you’ll see that Dublin and Ireland are relatively safe relative to other countries and other cities in the western world. “But there’s no place that’s 100% safe and I acknowledge that. What I say to people is that we’re taking actions in all of these areas, increasing Garda numbers and Garda resources, making our laws tougher, with tougher sentences in particular, appointing more judges, expanding our prison places. “(There is) also a big focus now on community safety partnerships, because it can’t be all just about a law and order response. Other things are important too, including things like street lighting, like cameras, like engaging with different services around addiction and mental health and so on. That’s the approach that we’re taking.” Asked how he responded to accounts from individuals who have been assaulted in the capital, the Taoiseach added: “Of course I am concerned about individual negative experiences that people have in Dublin or anywhere else. That’s something you’re very aware of and very exposed to as a politician. “Somebody would have maybe a very bad experience of our health service. But I’m also aware of the counterfactual or the other sides of the story, if you’d like, the huge number of people who have a very positive experience of our health service, for example and say so when surveyed. “The same thing applies to people coming into town, coming into our cities and coming into our country. “Most people, thankfully, don’t experience being victims of violent crime in Dublin or anywhere else. “While it’s really important that we listen to and acknowledge the stories of people who have a very bad experience, we have a responsibility as politicians and journalists not to make the mistake of thinking that bad experiences are the majority or are the norm.” Comments: Our rules We want our comments to be a lively and valuable part of our community - a place where readers can debate and engage with the most important local issues. The ability to comment on our stories is a privilege, not a right, however, and that privilege may be withdrawn if it is abused or misused. Please report any comments that break our rules. [Read the rules here](/misc/comments)

author: @WVVA
title: Protecting your pipes during freezing temperatures
text: Protecting your pipes during freezing temperatures PRINCETON, W.Va. (WVVA) - The owner of Bud Hypes Plumbing in Princeton, Patty Hypes is sharing important advice for this colder time of year. Hypes says people can keep their pipes from freezing by opening cabinet doors on sinks to expose pipes to heat. Adding that you can also leave cold water running on the farthest sink from your water lines outside. Hypes says for this to be effective however, the stream from the sink needs to be about the size of a pencil. “They can also make sure, if its a mobile home that there’s no wind that can get in under the underpinning. Make sure it’s closed up good. In your homes you have vents on the outside of your house and make sure they’re closed to keep the cold air out from under the house,” said Hypes. Hypes says when water freezes it takes up more space than usual and when that frozen water thaws it can create a build up of pressure that leads to pipes bursting. She says there are other precautions you can take to ensure your pipes don’t freeze. “They should have their pipes insulated. That’s the first thing, that their pipes be insulated. If they don’t they can put a heat tape on it. Right when it comes into the house, that also helps,” said Hypes. Hypes says if a pipe were to burst in your home, it wouldn’t be cheap to fix. She says water damage can be expensive and that’s not all, you would also need to get the pipes fixed. She says this can cost thousands of dollars depending on how many pipes were damaged. Copyright 2024 WVVA. All rights reserved.

author: Igor Almenara Carneiro
title: LG apresenta nova linha de notebooks gram e gram Pro de 2024
text: Os novos LG gram e gram Pro foram apresentados nesta quinta-feira (28). Os novos modelos prometem entregar um corpo leve e compacto com alto nível de desempenho, além de tela com alta densidade de pixels. Confira com o TecMundo os detalhes dos produtos da LG, que são novidades em 2024. Acompanhe! Os novos modelos LG gram estarão disponíveis em exibição na CES 2024.Fonte: [ LG/Divulgação ](https://www.lgnewsroom.com/2023/12/lg-gram-pro-boasts-ultra-slim-light-weight-design-and-powerful-performance-with-ai/) Especificações do notebook LG gram 2024 A [nova geração de notebooks](https://www.tecmundo.com.br/produto/272044-lg-anuncia-notebook-dobravel-gram-fold.htm) começa pelos modelos mais básicos, os LG gram de 2024. Os dispositivos serão vendidos nos tamanhos 14" (14Z90S), 15" (15Z90S), 16" (16Z90S) e 17" (17Z90S). Todos são equipados com processadores Intel Core Ultra 5 e 7 (não especificados), com gráficos integrados Intel Arc. O chip pode ser combinado por 8 GB, 16 GB ou 32 GB de RAM LPDDR5X (Dual Channel) e armazenamento M.2 NVMe – 256 GB, 512 GB, 1 TB ou 2 TB. Em display, os modelos de 16" e 17" são oferecidos em 60 Hz ou 144 Hz na resolução WQXGA (2560x1600p), enquanto as versões menores estão apenas em 60 Hz, Full HD (1920x1080p) em 15" e WUXGA (1920x1200p) em 14". Dimensões do LG gram 2024 Abaixo, confira as dimensões dos novos modelos: - LG gram 14: 312 x 214,3 x 16,9 mm, 1,1 kg; - LG gram 15: 356,27 x 223,4 x 16,95 mm, 1,29 kg ou 1,3 kg (touch); - LG gram 16: 355,1 x 242,3 x 16,8 mm, 1,19 kg, 1,2 kg (VRR) ou 1,26 kg (touch); - LG gram 17: 378,8 x 258,8 x 17,8 mm, 1,35 kg, 1,35 kg (VRR) ou 1,41 kg (touch); Especificações do notebook LG gram Pro 2024 Com os LG gram Pro, o foco continua em oferecer performance num tamanho compacto. Os modelos também são equipados com processadores Intel Core Ultra 5 e 7 (não especificados), mas também contam com opções com GPU Nvidia RTX 3050 de 4 GB. Nesse caso, as opções são de 16" (16T90SP e 16Z90SP) e 17" (17Z90SP). Um dos modelos é híbrido, permitindo uso como tablet ou notebook e cada um deles está disponível com display LCD ou OLED. Assim como as versões mais básicas, o LG gram Pro oferece até 32 GB de RAM (LPDDR5X em Dual Channel). O armazenamento varia entre 256 GB, 512 GB ou 1 TB (NVMe Gen4). - Saiba mais: [10 TVs da LG para ficar de olho em 2024](https://www.tecmundo.com.br/produto/274588-10-tvs-lg-olho-2024.htm) Dimensões do LG gram Pro de 2024 Veja as medidas dos LG gram Pro de 2024: - LG gram Pro 16" (2 em 1): 357,25 x 253,8 x 12,4 - 12,9 mm, 1,39 kg; - LG gram Pro 16": 357,7 x 251,6 x 12,4 - 12,8 mm e 1,19 kg (GPU Intel Arc), 257,7 x 251,6 x 13 - 14,4 mm e 1,27 kg (GPU Nvidia); - LG gram Pro 17": 357,7 x 251,6 x 12,6 - 12,9 mm e 1,29 kg (GPU Intel Arc), 257,7 x 251,6 x 13,2 - 14,6 mm e 1,37 kg (GPU Nvidia); Preço e disponibilidade dos novos notebooks LG Até agora, a LG não divulgou preço ou a data em que os novos LG gram serão vendidos. Contudo, os modelos estarão disponíveis em exibição durante a CES 2024, marcada para acontecer entre 9 e 12 de janeiro. Gostou do conteúdo? Então, continue de olho aqui no portal para se manter atualizado sobre tecnologia, ciência e entretenimento. Até a próxima! Fontes

author: @zazoomblog
title: Metalmeccanici in sciopero per il rinnovo del contratto I sindacati | Punte di adesione del 100%
text:
Metalmeccanici in sciopero per il rinnovo del contratto I sindacati | Punte di adesione del 100%
Hanno sfilato venerdì mattina partendo da via Trieste, dal cinema Astoria, a piazza Paul Harris a Ravenna i lavoratori del settore metalmeccanico per chiedere il rinnovo del contratto. Per Fim Cisl, Fiom Cgil e Uilm Uil, quella di oggi è stata un’altra giornata di lotta dopo le mobilitazioni.Leggi su Ravennatoday.it
Ravennatoday.it - Metalmeccanici in sciopero per il rinnovo del contratto. I sindacati: "Punte di adesione del 100%"

author: REDACCIÓN CARTAGENA
title: “Ya los turistas no van a querer venir”: Siad Char denuncia robo en Cartagena | EL UNIVERSAL - Cartagena
text: La reconocida modelo y presentadora de farándula Siad Char denunció a través de un video un caso de robo que sufrió su cuñado mientras montaba bicicleta en Cartagena. [Lea también: “En mi propia cara se llevó el celular”, cámara capta robo en almacén del Centro](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/cartagena/en-mi-propia-cara-se-llevo-el-celular-camara-capta-robo-en-almacen-del-centro-ED9702464) “Él salió y unos señores en una moto lo pararon, le quitaron el celular y el reloj y el nunca puso resistencia pero ellos no contentos con eso se devuelven y le meten un puñal. Gracias a Dios solo se le rompió la ropa con el cuchillo y se rasguñó un poco la piel, pero no hubo herida profunda”, dijo Char. La presentadora lamentó la situación de inseguridad en la ciudad y le envió un mensaje a sus seguidores: “Tengan muchísimo cuidado, no anden en la calle con el celular. Ya lo que debería ser normal no lo es. Uno ya ni siquiera puede salir a hacer ejercicio”, manifestó. Char hizo un llamado a reflexionar sobre el daño que este tipo de sucesos le hacen a la ciudad. “¿Cómo es posible que estas cosas pasen? Es desafortunado que pase esto en una ciudad tan linda como Cartagena, en una ciudad turística. Ya a los turistas no les va a dar más ganas de venir”, manifestó. La presentadora indicó que la Policía fue solidaria con su cuñado, sin embargo reiteró que “es terrible lo que está sucediendo en la ciudad”.
